Question
========

The *margin of error* of a *confidence interval* increases as

Answerlist
----------

* The confidence level gets lower
* The standard error increases
* The sample size increases

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The confidence level gets lower: Incorrect
* The standard error increases: Correct
* The sample size increases: Incorrect
